name: Pace Rhythm
description:
Welcome to Pace.

Pace Rhythm is a 2D endless runner rhythm game.

Jump to the beat of your music.*

Includes 26 songs from spratticus (https://soundcloud.com/spratticus).

Choose to play with 0, 2, 3, 4 or 5 colors.

Pick between 5 levels of speed.


How to Play:

If you are playing with 0 colors, tap the screen to make the player jump.

If you are playing with 2, 3, 4 or 5 colors, tap the button that matches the color of the platform the player is on to jump.

More platforms will spawn at higher speeds.

The layout of the buttons can be customized using different presets.


*iTunes music in your library that is downloaded and not DRM-protected will show up in game and can be used. Music from Apple Music, Spotify or other streaming services will not work. Music stored only in iCloud and not downloaded to the device will not work.


Contact:

Send any questions or comments to pacerhythm@tutanota.com.
